title: 爱拍好还是优酷好
author: 黑哥DADA
txt_content:
爱拍好还是优酷好！

死都不忘推荐我的优酷空间：http://i.youku.com/u/UMTM4OTgxOTQzNg
合作者的优酷空间：http://i.youku.com/u/UMjczNTQ4MTMyOA

replies.author: wdsjwzzz
replies.txt_content: 这算是变相宣传？不过肯定是优酷好，爱拍也可以，不过视频质量普遍较差

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content: youtube好......

replies.author: (兜兜）
replies.txt_content: 果断优酷

replies.author: nannan20041016
replies.txt_content: 优酷，不过爱拍感觉纯拍游戏温暖一些~

replies.author: GenjiKai
replies.txt_content:
优酷好
爱拍都是小学生的聚集地

replies.author: 在墙里窒息
replies.txt_content: 赶脚，优酷好

replies.author: 末影矿工
replies.txt_content: youtube最好

replies.author: 鱼青余
replies.txt_content:
优酷好一点，
爱拍太蛋疼了

replies.author: a993093644
replies.txt_content: 优酷好

replies.author: 风动鸣
replies.txt_content: 优酷君比较靠谱~使用程度也比较广泛~~当然是优酷君啦~~~{:10_525:}

replies.author: 懦弱的我
replies.txt_content: B站最好

replies.author: 111qwert1
replies.txt_content: 爱拍好，爱拍工资比优酷好，画质的话是用Fraps拍就好了，没有看到陈子豪吗，天下第一啊

replies.author: 心亂
replies.txt_content: 优酷！！！

replies.author: lzqjohn22
replies.txt_content: B站好，不解释。外加爱拍？想多了
